title: Perfectly Located Studios and in Lakeview East
posting_body: Hampden Court apartments have been on the cover of Chicago Magazine and have won awards on "Apartment Therapy's Small Cool Contest" several times.
3 room studio apartments with varying layouts.
Live in the heart of the action in a beautiful residential setting.
The building has two laundry rooms, storage lockers and bike storage in the basement.
Two full-time janitors who live in the building as well as an on-site manager with office hours Monday through Friday.
We require applicants to have a minimum credit score of 625.
Rent to Gross Income ratio no more than 33%.
Credit and background checks will be run on all applicants.
